channel.title: I get a run error?
channel.description:
i get this error every time i click on run:
Now starting DangerZone508... Please wait...
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:365) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at palidino76.rs2.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:53) at palidino76.rs2.Server.main(Server.java:76) Press any key to continue . . .
help plz???

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @jacky6702 jacky6702
item.description:
@jacky6702 wrote:

ockinawa:

i dont see anything in my process tree thats says java.net.bind thing

Turn off Utorrent if it is running.

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @ockinawa ockinawa
item.description:
@ockinawa wrote:

i dont see anything in my process tree thats says java.net.bind thing

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

java.net.Bind is already being used by something else, maybe you have a program running that uses this? Check your Process tree.

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @ockinawa ockinawa
item.description:
@ockinawa wrote:

what do i then to get rid of that? so i can run server

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Exception in thread "main" [3/14/11 10:07 AM]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind

There’s your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @ockinawa ockinawa
item.description:
@ockinawa wrote:

well i downloaded a new server because that one didnt work and i get this error when i go into source and hit runserver i get this error

[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: Launching Luckscape.
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: Made by Maikie61.
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: Exception in thread “main” [3/14/11 10:07 AM]: java.net.Bind
Exception: Address already in use: bind
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc
e)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r
egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a
ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W
orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP
reservingRunnable.java:51)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[3/14/11 10:07 AM]: Saving players…
Press any key to continue . . .

why does this keep happening to me??? happens with every server :\

this is my runserver code thing

@echo off
title Luckscape
java -Xmx512m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.0.12.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

Close down the Run.bat and re-open it.

sigh

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @ockinawa ockinawa
item.description:
@ockinawa wrote:

its always when i run compile it works but when i run the run.bat it doesnt :\

what do you mean by restart it? like compile it or restarting the laptop im on?

Read full topic

item.title: I get a run error?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It means your server is already running. Close it and then restart it.

Read full topic
